item.title: Why Refactoring Helps
item.description: Take a look. I had this requirment: We conduct polls (which can be looked at like permanent polls). We gather monthly statistics. We want to : - find out votes cast till a month say Jun 2005 - find out votes cast for a quarter of a finanical year say Quarter 1 for 2004 - 2005 - find out votes cast for a half yearly of a financial year say half year 1 for 2004 - 2005 - find out votes cast for a fin year say 2004 - 2005.
